MDX Is The Ultimate Playground
/$
$
CAMPER RENTALS NEAR TAMPA FLORIDA WITH ADD ONS AND MORE.
WHY CHOOSE ONE ADVENTURE WHEN YOU CAN DO IT ALL?
/$
$
Maverick is focused on changing the camper rental game, by providing all the ease and convenience of renting a camper including delivery to the parks, and everything need. But what sets us apart, is all of our recreation vehicle rentals that help to elevate your stay to the next level for unforgettable camping experiences.
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Our Story
/$
$
/$
$
At MDX (Maverick Destinations & Experiences), we believe adventure should be effortless, exciting, and available to everyone. Based in Florida, we offer a one-of-a-kind outdoor experience that combines RV rentals, UTV rentals, ATV riding, and family camping—all in one place. Whether you’re looking for Tampa RV rentals, Orlando camping, or Florida ATV riding, MDX is your gateway to the ultimate adventure.
A Vision for Outdoor Exploration
What started as a passion for off-road riding and outdoor escapes has grown into a full-scale adventure company designed to give families, couples, and thrill-seekers an unforgettable experience. We saw a need for affordable and convenient Florida RV rentals paired with ATV riding in Tampa and beyond. Instead of spending hours piecing together your trip, MDX offers all the fun in one package—so you can focus on making memories.
The MDX Experience
Whether you want to explore the wild trails with our Tampa UTV rentals, set up a cozy night under the stars at a family-friendly campground, or enjoy the best of camping near Disney World, we have you covered. Our rentals make it easy for visitors and locals to experience the beauty of Florida’s great outdoors.
• RV Rentals in Tampa & Orlando – Travel in comfort with our top-quality Florida RV rentals, perfect for weekend getaways or extended vacations.
• ATV & UTV Rentals – Get your adrenaline pumping with Florida ATV riding at some of the best off-road locations in the state.
• Family Camping in Tampa & Orlando – Enjoy a hassle-free camping experience at top-rated campgrounds, complete with everything you need for a perfect stay.
• Camping Near Disney World – Make your trip to Orlando unforgettable with a unique camping experience just a short drive from the magic.
Why Choose MDX?
We don’t just offer rentals—we create custom experiences for every adventurer. Our team makes it easy to plan your trip, providing the best Tampa camping, Orlando RV rentals, and Florida ATV riding options in one seamless package. Whether you’re a Florida local or visiting from out of town, MDX is your go-to source for adventure.
Ready to experience the ultimate Florida adventure? Book your RV rental, ATV, or camping experience today!
​
